'''Notes''': A limited number of Centurion-class battlecruisers were used by the Republic during the Mandalorian Wars, and they were intended to replace the Inexpungeable-class ships. When Darth Revan organizes the Sith army, these ships become prestigious mobile fortresses for his forces. Later, Darth Nihilus restores a Centurion-class battlecruiser for use as his personal ship.
